tool.name: Amino Acid Variants
tool.command:
ln -f -s ${input_bam.metadata.bam_index} ${input_bam}.bai && quasitools call aavar $input_bam $ref_file $input_genes
#if $var_file: $var_file #end if
#if $mutation_db: $mutation_db #end if
#if $min_freq: -f $min_freq #end if
#if $error_rate: -e $error_rate #end if
-o output.vcf

param.name: var_file
param.label: Variants file
param.help: Not required. If not supplied, a variants file will be generated using the input bam file.

param.name: mutation_db
param.label: Mutation DB
param.help: Not required. Defaults to HIV mutation database.

param.name: min_freq
param.label: Minimum frequency
param.help: The minimum required frequency. Defaults to 0.01.

param.name: error_rate
param.label: Error rate
param.help: Estimated sequencing error rate. Defaults to 0.0021.

tool.help:
Amino Acid Variants ===================
Identifies amino acid mutations for a BAM file.
